Description: You are looking at a 2011 Music Man Silhouette Ball Family Reserve. It has been customized by adding a pickguard that completely changes and improves the appearance of the guitar. It has an amazing "black sugar" paint finish that is almost completely invisible from a few feet away but upon close inspection is a deep metallic sparkle that has to be seen in person. In addition the guitar comes with a roasted maple neck that is highly figured and beautiful. This guitar was customized by GURU Guitars in Raleigh, NC. This included the construction and installation of a custom pickguard as well as 3 Seymour Duncan pickups. The neck pickup is a special order Seymour Duncan SINGLE COIL in a humbucker case. This is a factory Seymour Duncan pickup. Note the single row of magnets. High output.The middle pickup is a Seymour Duncan mini-humbucker.The bridge pickup is a high output Seymour Duncan with alnico magnets.This guitar also comes with a VERY RARE Ball Family Reserve Case. Please note photos. These are impossible to find.
Title: CUSTOM - Ernie Ball Music Man Silhouette BFR Ball Family Reserve - Roasted Maple
